member.summary: Represents a device provider responsible for DMX devices.

member.summary: Gets a list of all defined device-definitions.

member.exception: Thrown if this constructor is called even if there is already an instance of this class.

member.summary: Adds the specified to this device-provider.

member.summary: Represents a E1.31-DXM-device.

member.summary: Represents device information for a />.

member.name: F:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DeviceInfo.CID_LENGTH
member.summary: The length of the CID;

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DeviceInfo.Hostname
member.summary: The hostname of the device.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DeviceInfo.Port
member.summary: The port of the device.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DeviceInfo.CID
member.summary: The CID used to identify against the device.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DeviceInfo.Universe
member.summary: The Universe this device belongs to.

member.name: T:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition
member.summary: Represents the data used to create a E1.31 DMX-device.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.Hostname
member.summary: Gets or sets the hostname of the device.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port to device is listening to.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.DeviceType
member.summary: Gets or sets the of the device.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.Manufacturer
member.summary: Gets or sets the manufacturer of the device.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the model name of the device.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.CID
member.summary: Gets or sets the CID of the device (null will generate a random CID)

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.Universe
member.summary: Gets or sets the universe the device belongs to.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.Leds
member.summary: Gets or sets the led-mappings used to create the device.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.HeartbeatTimer
member.summary: The time in ms after which the device is updated even if no changes are made in the meantime to prevent the target from timing out or similar problems. To disable heartbeats leave it at 0.

member.name: M:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131DMXDeviceDefinition.AddLed(RGB.NET.Core.LedId,System.ValueTuple{System.Int32,System.Func{RGB.NET.Core.Color,System.Byte}}[])
member.summary: Adds a led-mapping to the device.
member.param: The used to identify the led.
The channels the led is using and a function mapping parts of the color to them.

member.name: T:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131UpdateQueue
member.summary: Represents the update-queue performing updates for E131-DMX devices.

member.name: F:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131UpdateQueue._socket
member.summary: The UDP-Connection used to send data.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131UpdateQueue.DataPacket
member.summary: Gets the byte-representation of a E1.31 packet as described in http://tsp.esta.org/tsp/documents/docs/E1-31-2016.pdf. CID, SequenceNumber, Universe and PropertyValues needs to be updated before use!

member.name: F:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131UpdateQueue._sequenceNumber
member.summary: The sequence-number used to detect the order in which packages where sent.

member.name: M:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131UpdateQueue.#ctor(RGB.NET.Core.IDeviceUpdateTrigger,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The update trigger used by this queue.
The hostname of the device this queue is performing updates for.
The port to connect to the device this queue is performing updates for.

member.name: M:RGB.NET.Devices.DMX.E131.E131UpdateQueue.GetNextSequenceNumber
member.summary: Increments the sequence number and wraps it if neded.

member.summary: Marker interface for DMX device definitions.
